# init

**Instance Method**

Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

## Declaration

```swift
bool init();
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if initialization was successful, or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if an error occurred.

## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. Call [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IOTimerDispatchSource/Create] when you want to create a new timer dispatch queue.

## Configuring the Timer Source

- **Create**: Creates and configures a timer dispatch object.
- **free**: Performs any final cleanup for the timer dispatch source.
- **SetHandler**: Sets the handler block to run when the timer fires.
